DESCRIPTIONS: Recieve #b

Onmyoji:Encouraged.NAME: Rally
DESCRIPTIONS: Double the final damage in the next attack. Reduced by #b1 unless no damage is made.

Onmyoji:Unyielding.NAME: Unyielding
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduced by #b1 when your #yShikigami receive critical damage, If #yShikigami temp HP > 1, reduce the damage to temp HP - 1 .

Onmyoji:Breakthrough.NAME: Crimson Flowers
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduced by #b1 when your #yShikigami receive damage, and transfer the damage to your character instead.

Onmyoji:Ice Shield.NAME: Frost Core
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBlock the first attack from every enemy in a turn will apply #b
#yWeak to the enemy. Removed at the start of the owner's turn.

Onmyoji:Dark Dream.NAME: Eternal Slumber
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn attach #b

Onmyoji:News.NAME: Enlightenment
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use #yLantern upgrade all cards in your hand.

Onmyoji:Chord.NAME: Evolved Kagura
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, channel #b

Onmyoji:Cuteness.NAME: Cute is Justice
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn obtain #b
random Shikigami card(s) which cost 0 in this turn, and Luck 6 : double the Shikigami HP.

Onmyoji:Moonlight Night.NAME: Misty Moonlight
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn obtain a Faction power according to your current Faction. Each power can only be obtained once.

Onmyoji:Cursed Eye.NAME: Cursed Eye
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card attached extra effect draw #b
more card.

Onmyoji:Maze of Mind.NAME: Mind Maze
DESCRIPTIONS: The costs of Shikigami cards are random, and whenever you use a Shikigami card make a card in your hand cost 0 this turn.
